review: Dr.Monisha is highly experienced , friendly and makes you feel comfortable. She encourages you to have a natural birth and provides great care towards her patients.I had a natural birth and the nurses took great care.I would definitely recommend Dr.Monisha and her clinic as they provide the best service possible.

I went to Mother's care clinic for fertility treatment..I am very much pleased with Dr. Monisha treatment and care..I got conceived through IVF/ICSI treatment...Now I'm very happy and enjoying my Parenthood...Thank you doctor and team for wonderful service provided...

Dr Monisha is truly amazing doctor!!!!  She made both my pregnancies painless through her extraordinary knowledge, abundance experience and her attitude towards her patients. She is not only a perfect doctor but also a great human being. She will explain everything in detail and will give you quality time.
Personally, she has been a source of inspiration and bundle of positive vibes for me. I have great faith in her able hands. I canâ€™t thank her enough for being such a lovely doctor. I will definitely recommend her.

We are extremely please with the service of Dr.Monisha. She has taken all minute details into consideration and has supported us through all phases of pregnancy. The doctor and nurses are available whenever required.
